title: The Dangers of Mass Censorship are Growing (Ep 1437)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the troubling new video of liberal tyrants and media totalitarians openly calling for a surveillance-style police state.

News Picks:

Former Facebook executive pushes for mass censorship of conservative voices. 


Parler will be back!

The FBI is reportedly vetting National Guard personnel for the Inauguration.

Why is Gina Haspel so worried about exposing the Swamp?


New evidence of the connection between the Wuhan lab and COVID-19. 


Troubling information emerges about the origins of the coronavirus.


Hotel chain joins cancel culture brigade.


Apple’s Tim Cook has a tough time with the definition of free speech.
